query:
UPDATE dao_proposals SET
                id = $1,
                proposal_id = $2,
                description = $3,
                kind = $4,
                proposer = $5,
                status = $6,
                submission_time = $7,
                vote_counts = $8,
                votes = $9,
                total_votes = $10,
                dao_instance = $11,
                proposal_action = $12,
                tx_timestamp = $13,
                hash = $14
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING proposal_id
